         {"name": "Toronto Coffee and Tea Expo","description": "Toronto, you REALLY love your coffee and tea! That’s why we’re celebrating our extraordinary culture for the second year in a row. 

Contest Rules and Regulations Below 

The Toronto Coffee and Tea Expo pays tribute to the talents and passion of this buzzing community, all under one roof! We are passionate about bringing together the top local talent infused with international flavours, offering guests the chance to experience a wide variety of tea, coffee, and complementary goods.

So you’re hooked on hot beverages - here’s why the Toronto Coffee and Tea Expo is for you:

- Free drink samples
- Discover new beans, leaves and recipes
- International and exotic flavours 
- Coffee varietals like you’ve never seen before 
- Learn industry tips and tricks from some of the community’s finest
- Become your own barista with beans and leaves for purchase
- Immerse yourself in our vibrant cafe culture
- Take part in our interactive workshops, like TIY (Tea It Yourself) and espresso making

Come and celebrate with us on April 14th and 15th from 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM at Evergreen Brickworks! 

To ensure a smooth and timely entry, there are two entry times each day (before 2pm and after 2pm). Attendees are welcome to stay as long as they like!","id": "5ac6b007a4cb37e37d7beaff","source": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/37/Nice_Cup_of_Tea.jpg"},
         {"id": "5ac6b007be30ace75c573156","name": "Toronto Poutine Fest","description": "Toronto's first Poutine Fest! Yonge-Dundas Square to try some of Canada's best food trucks and over 50 varieties of gourmet poutine. http://www.poutinefestontour.com/
